title: Moo Later
name: moolater
description: Quickly save a web page as a task in Remember the Milk to read later. You will need to give MooLater permission to use your Remember the Milk account the first time you try to save a task.
author: Christopher Frost (http://chrisfrost.com)

scripts.build:
npm run test -s && echo '
=> building
' && jpm xpi

preferences.name: extensions.moolater.defaultList
preferences.title: Default List
preferences.description: List to save new tasks to, if it dosn't exist new tasks will go in the Inbox.

preferences.name: extensions.moolater.useTitle
preferences.title: Use Title
preferences.description: Use the title of the current tab as a task description.

preferences.name: extensions.moolater.useLink
preferences.title: Use Address
preferences.description: Use the address of the current tab as a task link.

preferences.name: extensions.moolater.useSmartAdd
preferences.title: Use Smart Add
preferences.description: Tell Remember The Milk to use Smart Add when adding a task.
